title: Sample Size Calculator – Surveys, Proportions & Finite Population

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Survey / proportion: \( n_0 = \frac{z^2 \, p (1 - p)}{E^2} \) FPC: \( n = \frac{n_0}{1 + \frac{n_0 - 1}{N}} \) Mean / continuous: \( n_0 = \left( \frac{z \sigma}{E} \right)^2 \)
